page.title: 09ACLE VC PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: LIKE MANY SCHOOLS IN SMALL VILLAGES, ACLE PRIMARY IS ONE OF THE FOCAL POINTS OF THE COMMUNITY.ALTHOUGH THE PRESENT PREMISES ARE SOMEWHAT CRAMPED AND OLD (IN PARTS OVER 3OO YEARS OLD!) THE ATMOSPHERE OF THE SCHOOL IS FRIENDLY AND WELCOMING AND THERE IS A FLOURISHING PARENT TEACHER ASSOCIATION DESPITE THE ANCIENT BUILDINGS AND MOBILE CLASSROOMS,THE PRIMARY SCHOOL'S CURRICULUM IS A BLEND OF THE BEST OF TRADITIONAL AND MODERN APPROACHES - THERE IS A COMPUTER IN EVERY ROOM, INCLUDING THE INFANT RECEPTION CLASS. DURING THE SUMMER OF 1985 RUMBLINGS FROM THE EDUCATION OFFICE SUGGESTED THAT BUILDING OF NEW PREMISES MIGHT START FAIRLY SOON.SHOULD THIS BE THE CASE, IT IS TO BE HOPED THAT THE CHANGE OF SITE WILL NOT AFFECT THE PRESENT EXCELLENT RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN STAFF,PUPILS AND COMMUNITY.
